thread.title: Jusuf Nurkic wore a shirt that read 'If you can read this you're too close, he has a girlfriend'
thread.title_full: Jusuf Nurkic wore a shirt that read 'If you can read this you're too close, he has a girlfriend'

author: James Dator
title: Jusuf Nurkic wore a shirt that read 'If you can read this you're too close, he has a girlfriend'
text:
Jusuf Nurkic didn’t turn up to his Monday night game in designer attire or a bold new look, just an understated jacket and a t-shirt with a message.
Jusuf Nurkic wore a shirt with his girlfriend's face on it that read "If you can read this you're too close, he has a girlfriend" pic.twitter.com/kqkMGPcvge 
— Justin Jett (@JustinJett_) March 5, 2017 The shirt carries a simple message about Nurkic’s love life that’s important. The black writing on dark blue makes it difficult to read, and that’s what elevates the shirt. You’ve got to respect the game here: This is a solid move.
Not only does the shirt help send a message, but it’s a real life “zoom in on the pic” meme. That’s difficult to pull off. Unfortunately, there was only one step to this one — so we had to add some more.
